title: The Hero's Shade
description: The first boss enemy encountered in DtgA.
location: Can be found on Hope's Rise near the eastern shrine.

title: Cursed Puppets
description: It's like thunderblight with more magic. Theres 4 versions so it won't be the same fight every time. Will appear when the sky turns pale blue.
location: Can be found in the forests around Hyrule.

title: Argorok
description: Currently a WIP. You can climb on him if you have stasis. He WILL break halfway through the fight.
location: Found at the top of the Dueling Peaks.

title: Darknut
description: Currently a WIP. You can't kill him yet as the fight will require the megaton hammer.

title: Galahad
description: Pretty straightforward, just stay close and nail your parries.

title: Lancelot
description: Currently a WIP. He'll seem like he's stuck in an animation, but stagger him out of it and then stay far away from his spear.
location: Found at the Shrine of Courage.

title: Robin
description: Can be a challenge, but you'll be fine if you take care of the adds and shoot well.
location: Found at the Heteno shooting range.

title: Miko and Sibyl
description: These are fast, hit hard, and deal a TON of aoe damage. The arena is basicaly made of fire so bring some Fireproof potions or a flamebreaker set.
